enhanced_description: Khao Pad Sapparot is a beloved hearty and satisfying main course from central Thailand that with a subtle warmth. Pineapple fried rice served in pineapple shell. This medium recipe takes about 20 minutes to prepare and represents the authentic flavors of Central Thai cuisine balances sweet, sour, salty and spicy flavors perfectly. The combination of rice, pineapple, shrimp creates a harmonious blend that has made this dish a favorite among locals and visitors alike. Perfect for those seeking reasonably priced authentic Thai cuisine.
